metadata.title: Quadra Robot
metadata.description: Quadra Robot is dedicated to creating non-humanoid robots that can do housework for under 30,000 RMB, proving that non-humanoid robots offer better value and are more popular than humanoid robots.

hero.title: Quadra Robot
hero.subtitle: Creating non-humanoid robots that can do housework for under 30,000 RMB.

vision.title: Vision
vision.subtitle: Breaking Tradition, Innovating the Future
vision.description: We firmly believe that future robots should not be limited to simply replicating the human form.

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.content1: Organisms in nature have evolved over billions of years, developing astonishing diversity and adaptability. However, biological evolution has its inherent limitations. For example, organisms cannot evolve parts like wheels that can rotate continuously, which is determined by the physical and chemical properties of basic components such as biological cells, muscles, and bones.
philosophy.content2: The power source of organisms is complex biochemical reactions, which are fundamentally different from mechanical power devices such as electric motors. Therefore, simply imitating the form of humans or animals to design robots does not fully leverage the advantages of mechanical and electronic technology.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content1: We believe that humanoid robots are too expensive, making them difficult to popularize in households. Moreover, household chores, cooking, laundry, and cleaning do not require a 'humanoid' form to complete, so there is no need to insist on a 'humanoid' design.
mission.content2: Quadra Robot is dedicated to creating non-humanoid robots that can do housework for under 30,000 RMB, proving that non-humanoid robots offer better value and are more popular than humanoid robots.

name.title: The Meaning of Our Name
name.content: Before human civilization, the quadrilateral shape was rare in nature. But after the emergence of human civilization, doors, windows, tables, chairs, cars, houses, etc., quadrilaterals are everywhere. Because it is the most practical and efficient shape, meeting various human needs at the lowest cost. And this is our philosophy: practical, low-cost, starting from household chores, gradually penetrating into various human labor scenarios, into various industries.

design.title: Product Design
design.subtitle: Wheel + Lifting Column + Dual Arm Solution
design.description: Our non-humanoid household robot adopts an innovative design concept to meet actual household needs.

items.title: Footprint
items.description: No larger than an adult's footprint, to adapt to smaller kitchens in urban areas.

items.title: Mobility
items.description: Able to move forward, backward, sideways, and turn flexibly in small spaces.

items.title: Picking & Operating Range
items.description: Can pick up items from the floor at the lowest and reach items in the top kitchen cabinets at the highest.

items.title: Strength
items.description: Can carry everyday household items, such as chairs, water barrels, and pots full of beef soup.

items.title: Battery Life
items.description: Must be able to work continuously for more than 3 hours on a single charge.

items.title: Remote Response & Proactive Contact
items.description: Can respond to the owner's remote commands via WeChat, WhatsApp.

items.title: Safety Perception
items.description: When people or objects approach nearby, the robot will modify its planned behavior to avoid collisions.

solution.title: Design Solution
solution.description: Our design adopts a wheel + lifting column + dual arm solution, including the following core components:

items.title: Mecanum Wheels
items.description: Provide omnidirectional mobility, allowing the robot to move flexibly in small spaces.

items.title: Telescopic Lifting Column
items.description: Maximum height of about 1.5 meters, supporting the mechanical arm to reach the maximum height that an ordinary adult's arm can reach.

items.title: Mechanical Arm
items.description: Length equivalent to an adult's arm, about 0.7 meters, can be equipped with dexterous hands.

items.title: Chassis
items.description: All heavier components are placed in the chassis as much as possible to maintain stability.

team.title: Team Recruitment
team.subtitle: Join Us, Change the Future
team.description: We are a 'starting from scratch' entrepreneurial team, a group of young people, unconventional, with dreams, creativity, and funding.

items.title: Global Collaboration
items.description: We reject traditional '9-to-5' or punch-in systems, no need for commuting, work from home allows you to work efficiently in a comfortable environment, team members are located around the world, communicating and collaborating efficiently through advanced online collaboration platforms, breaking geographical limitations.

items.title: Equity Incentives
items.description: All employees are given shares while being paid. Your shares are proportional to your contribution.

items.title: Result-Oriented
items.description: Focus on results, achieve goals, give high rewards. For example: if you complete 4 months of goals in 2 months, you still get the full reward.

items.title: Robot Hardware Engineer
items.description: Responsible for robot hardware design, assembly, and testing.

items.title: Embodied Intelligence Software Engineer
items.description: Responsible for robot AI algorithm and intelligent interaction system development.
